subject: Re: [junit] How to generate JUnit HTML reports in Android
msgSnippet: Vamsi, There may be experts in ant and android here, but if you don t hear from them, you may also want to try android-specific forums.  Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
Vamsi,

There may be experts in ant and android here, but if you don't hear
from them, you may also want to try android-specific forums. Good
luck,

David Saff

On Wed, Oct 13, 2010 at 12:37 AM, Vamsi <vamsi.makam@...> wrote:
> Hi All,
>
>    I am using ant build system to build my Android project, and I am trying to generate HTML reports by using junitreport ant task. Its generating HTML and XML reports but all are empty.
>
>    Can any one please suggest me. How to get HTML reports in Android.
>
> Thanks,
> Vamsi.
>
